name: Baubles and sparkles cushion cover - Berry red -Small
description:
Knitted cushion cover, made by hand on the Sunshine Coast on my knitting machine.

The cushion, does NOT include the pad*. 

The cover is made from 100% Australian Wool which has been washed for a soft, slightly felted finish.

Wool is one of the most if not THE most eco fabric you can buy.

Its sustainable, it's biodegradable, it needs very little washing, it lasts for years and years and it is antibacterial which keeps the germs away and it's temperature regulating which means it keeps you warm in the winter and its cool in the summer.

The design features Christmas tree baubles and sparkles, this was the inspiration but it doesn't look overly Christmassy and is slightly abstract and quite suitable to be in your home all year round.

I have knitted this design in one colourway only, red and white, so classic, vibrant and beautiful.

I believe in high quality knitting and natural raw materials and this is what has been used to make this cushion.

The cushion pad size is 16" 40cm square. The cover measures 14.5" 37cm square for a comfortable fit.

* I can sell this cover with the pad. I currently don't have any stock of high quality feather and down (15% down) cushions, (I'm tryimg to find a good source at the moment) They are great because they have no spikey feathers poking through (tried and tested!) and keeps it shape through regular plumping extremely well, price would be $65 and the cost of shipping will be $12.

Please message me if interested and I'll create a custom listing for you.

If you would like more than 1 or a different colour please let me know and I'll knit to order.

name: Partridge and pear cushion cover - Pebble grey - Small
description:
Luxury high quality knitted cushion cover, made by hand on the Sunshine Coast on my knitting machine.

The cushion, does NOT include the pad*. 

The cover is made from 100% Australian Wool which has been washed for a soft, slightly felted finish. It has no hard buttons or zips, but a double layer fold over with rib edge to keep it soft and snuggly. This is shown on the photo, the reverse is pattern allover so can be displayed either way.

Wool is one of the most if not THE most eco fabric you can buy.

Its sustainable, it's biodegradable, it needs very little washing, it lasts for years and years and it is antibacterial which keeps the germs away and it's temperature regulating which means it keeps you warm in the winter and its cool in the summer.

The design features a Partridge bird and a pear from the 12 days of Chritsmas song, this was the inspiration but it doesn't look overly Christmassy and quite suitable to be in your home all year round.

I have knitted this design in one colourway only, pebble grey and white, so classic, and neutral it will go with any colour scheme.

I believe in high quality knitting and natural raw materials and this is what has been used to make this cushion.

The cushion pad size is 16" 40cm square. The cover measures 14.5" 37cm square for a comfortable fit.

* I can sell this cover with the pad. I have in stock high quality feather and down (15% down) cushion which has no spikey feathers poking through (tried and tested!) and keeps it shape through regular plumping extremely well, price would be $65 and the cost of shipping will be $15 within Australia, Please message me if interested and I'll create a custom listing for you and work out shipping if you're not in Australia.

If you would like more than 1 or a different colour please let me know and I'll knit to order.
